# ViewModifier.Content

**Type Alias**

The content view type passed to `body()`.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Content
```

## Creating a view modifier

- **body(content:)**: Gets the current body of the caller.
- **Body**: The type of view representing the body.

items.description: Gets the current body of the caller.
items.name: body(content:)

items.description: The type of view representing the body.
